languages.text: "Ничего не говорят. Слова как слова". {n}Неожиданно Идира осекается и морщится. Прикладывает руки к вискам. Снова морщится.{/n} "Шепот... такой тихий, что я едва его поймала... как перышко падает на пух... что-то про проклятые амбиции, древность, страшную древность... и случайность. Случайность поперек всего".

"They mean nothing to me. They're just words." {n}Suddenly, Idira breaks off and winces. She brings her hands to her temples. She winces again.{/n} "A whisper... so quiet I barely caught it... like a feather landing on a pile of down... Something about damned ambitions, antiquity, terrible antiquity... and chance. Chance through it all."
languages.original_text: "Ничего не говорят. Слова как слова". {n}Неожиданно Идира осекается и морщится. Прикладывает руки к вискам. Снова морщится.{/n} "Шепот... такой тихий, что я едва его поймала... как перышко падает на пух... что-то про проклятые амбиции, древность, страшную древность... и случайность. Случайность поперек всего".

languages.text: «No significan nada para mí. Son solo palabras». {n}Idira enmudece de repente y hace una mueca de dolor, llevándose las manos a las sienes. Otra mueca más.{/n} «Un susurro... tan quedo, que apenas lo he captado... como si una pluma aterrizase sobre algodones... Algo sobre ambiciones fatídicas, una terrible antigüedad... y oportunidad. Oportunidad, entre todo lo demás».
languages.original_text: "They mean nothing to me. They're just words." {n}Suddenly, Idira breaks off and winces. She brings her hands to her temples. She winces again.{/n} "A whisper... so quiet I barely caught it... like a feather landing on a pile of down... Something about damned ambitions, antiquity, terrible antiquity... and chance. Chance through it all."

traits.locale_text: «No significan nada para mí. Son solo palabras». {n}Idira enmudece de repente y hace una mueca de dolor, llevándose las manos a las sienes. Otra mueca más.{/n} «Un susurro... tan quedo, que apenas lo he captado... como si una pluma aterrizase sobre algodones... Algo sobre ambiciones fatídicas, una terrible antigüedad... y oportunidad. Oportunidad, entre todo lo demás».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「あたしにとっては何の意味もないわ。ただの言葉よ」{n}突然、イディラは話すのをやめて顔をしかめた。手をこめかみに当てて、ふたたび顔をしかめる。{/n}「囁きが…あまりにかすかで、ほとんど聞こえなかった…まるで羽毛の山の上に落ちる、一枚の羽根のよう…忌まわしい野心、古の…酷く古い何か…そして、偶然。すべてに潜む偶然」
languages.original_text: "They mean nothing to me. They're just words." {n}Suddenly, Idira breaks off and winces. She brings her hands to her temples. She winces again.{/n} "A whisper... so quiet I barely caught it... like a feather landing on a pile of down... Something about damned ambitions, antiquity, terrible antiquity... and chance. Chance through it all."

traits.locale_text: 「あたしにとっては何の意味もないわ。ただの言葉よ」{n}突然、イディラは話すのをやめて顔をしかめた。手をこめかみに当てて、ふたたび顔をしかめる。{/n}「囁きが…あまりにかすかで、ほとんど聞こえなかった…まるで羽毛の山の上に落ちる、一枚の羽根のよう…忌まわしい野心、古の…酷く古い何か…そして、偶然。すべてに潜む偶然」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “这些词对我而言毫无意义，只是词语本身罢了。”{n}突然之间，伊迪拉停了下来，皱起眉头。她揉了揉太阳穴，眉头又紧缩成一团。{/n}“那个低语声……太安静了，我差点就没听到……就像羽毛落在绒毛堆上……它呢喃着什么该死的野心、古老之物、极其可怕的古物……还有机遇。机遇藏在其中。”
languages.original_text: "They mean nothing to me. They're just words." {n}Suddenly, Idira breaks off and winces. She brings her hands to her temples. She winces again.{/n} "A whisper... so quiet I barely caught it... like a feather landing on a pile of down... Something about damned ambitions, antiquity, terrible antiquity... and chance. Chance through it all."

traits.locale_text: “这些词对我而言毫无意义，只是词语本身罢了。”{n}突然之间，伊迪拉停了下来，皱起眉头。她揉了揉太阳穴，眉头又紧缩成一团。{/n}“那个低语声……太安静了，我差点就没听到……就像羽毛落在绒毛堆上……它呢喃着什么该死的野心、古老之物、极其可怕的古物……还有机遇。机遇藏在其中。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Ça ne m'évoque rien du tout. Ce ne sont que des mots. » {n}Soudain, Idira s'interrompt et grimace, puis porte ses mains à ses tempes et grimace à nouveau.{/n} « Un murmure... si faible qu'il m'a juste effleurée... comme une plume se posant sur un duvet... Il parlait d'ambitions maudites, de l'antiquité, d'une terrible antiquité... et de la chance. De la chance qui irrigue tout. »
languages.original_text: "They mean nothing to me. They're just words." {n}Suddenly, Idira breaks off and winces. She brings her hands to her temples. She winces again.{/n} "A whisper... so quiet I barely caught it... like a feather landing on a pile of down... Something about damned ambitions, antiquity, terrible antiquity... and chance. Chance through it all."

traits.locale_text: « Ça ne m'évoque rien du tout. Ce ne sont que des mots. » {n}Soudain, Idira s'interrompt et grimace, puis porte ses mains à ses tempes et grimace à nouveau.{/n} « Un murmure... si faible qu'il m'a juste effleurée... comme une plume se posant sur un duvet... Il parlait d'ambitions maudites, de l'antiquité, d'une terrible antiquité... et de la chance. De la chance qui irrigue tout. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Sie bedeuten mir nichts. Es sind nur Worte." {n}Plötzlich verstummt Idira abrupt und verzieht das Gesicht. Sie legt sich die Hände an die Schläfen. Sie verzieht erneut das Gesicht.{/n} "Ein Flüstern ... so leise, dass ich es kaum gehört habe ... wie eine Feder, die auf einem Haufen Daunen landet ... Irgendwas von verdammten Ambitionen, dem Altertum, dem schrecklichen Altertum ... und dem Zufall. Alles durchzogen vom Zufall."
languages.original_text: "They mean nothing to me. They're just words." {n}Suddenly, Idira breaks off and winces. She brings her hands to her temples. She winces again.{/n} "A whisper... so quiet I barely caught it... like a feather landing on a pile of down... Something about damned ambitions, antiquity, terrible antiquity... and chance. Chance through it all."

Sie verzieht erneut das Gesicht.{/n} "Ein Flüstern ... so leise, dass ich es kaum gehört habe ... wie eine Feder, die auf einem Haufen Daunen landet ... Irgendwas von verdammten Ambitionen, dem Altertum, dem schrecklichen Altertum ... und dem Zufall. Alles durchzogen vom Zufall."

languages.original_text: "They mean nothing to me. They're just words." {n}Suddenly, Idira breaks off and winces. She brings her hands to her temples. She winces again.{/n} "A whisper... so quiet I barely caught it... like a feather landing on a pile of down... Something about damned ambitions, antiquity, terrible antiquity... and chance. Chance through it all."

languages.text: "Bana hiçbir şey ifade etmiyorlar. Hepsi birer söz, o kadar." {n}İdira, aniden duraksayıp irkiliyor. Ellerini şakaklarına getiriyor. Ardından yeniden irkiliyor.{/n} "Bir fısıltı... O kadar derinden geldi ki zar zor duyabildim. Tıpkı yığınla kuş tüyünün üzerine düşen tek bir tüy gibi... Kahreden hırslar, eski ve azametli uygarlıklar... Bir de bir olasılığa, her şeyi kapsayan bir olasılığa dair bir şeyler duyuyorum."
languages.original_text: "They mean nothing to me. They're just words." {n}Suddenly, Idira breaks off and winces. She brings her hands to her temples. She winces again.{/n} "A whisper... so quiet I barely caught it... like a feather landing on a pile of down... Something about damned ambitions, antiquity, terrible antiquity... and chance. Chance through it all."

traits.locale_text: "Bana hiçbir şey ifade etmiyorlar. Hepsi sadece sözden ibaret." {n}İdira, aniden duraksayıp irkiliyor. Ellerini şakaklarına getiriyor. Ardından yeniden irkiliyor.{/n} "Bir fısıltı... O kadar derinden geldi ki zar zor duyabildim. Tıpkı yığınla kuş tüyünün üzerine düşen tek bir tüy gibi... Kahreden hırslar, eski uygarlıklar, azametli uygarlıklar... Ve bir olasılığa dair bir şeyler duyuyorum. Her şeyi kapsayan bir olasılık..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
